text: Platanthera longiglandula is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Sichuan Province of China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Platanthera longiglandula. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Platanthera longiglandula
